page.title: 08Waltham All Saints Church.
page.content: There has been a church in Waltham since 1086 but the present building has been there since the thirteenth century.The church is open every day so people can come to pray.There are plenty of services on Sundays because most people are not at work and can attend. In 1086 there were 50 houses and farms .Now with 2100 houses the population has increased to 4700,but despite that the Rector's work of helping people is the same.The Church also helps people by raising money. After the church services people wanted to meet together so the church hall was built.Besides meetings there are ladies keep- fit classes,dancing, Cubs,Brownies,playschool and toddler groups.The children also meet for Sunday School when they learn about Jesus.
